name: Cole Street B.V.
goal: Cole Street is an IT company that wants to improve transparency in IT policy on the EU level. We assist clients in setting their strategies based on our predictions of IT policy changes.
interests: Communication, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Trans-European Networks

- EU Funding
